spec_data.Name: perl-ServiceNow-API
spec_data.Description:
The Perl API provides a library of Perl classes and sub routines
for programmatic access to the platform and its applications.
The API utilizes the SOAP web service interface of the platform.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:46:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: ServiceNow API for accessing the Service-now platform
